thumb.title: 奈落 Abyss 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、暗い異世界へと導く悲しげなメロディーを展開します。聴く人を堕ちていく幻想的な旅へ導き、心の奥に深く響く音楽が静かにその感情を包み込みます。暗い雰囲気の中に漂う深い悲しみや、どこか郷愁を誘う旋律が交錯し、聴く人の心に深い印象を残します。 This music develops a mournful melody that leads the listener into a dark otherworldly realm. The music leads the listener on a fantastic journey of falling away, and the music resonates deep in the heart, quietly enveloping the emotions of the listener. The deep sadness in the dark atmosphere and the nostalgia-inducing melody intermingle, leaving a deep impression on the listener's mind.https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
